com.collabnet.ccf.pi.sfee.v44
Class SFEEAttachmentHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.collabnet.ccf.pi.sfee.v44.SFEEAttachmentHandler

public class SFEEAttachmentHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for retrieving attachment data for an artifact from a Source SFEE repository.

Author:
madhusuthanan

Method Detail

attachFileToArtifact

public com.vasoftware.sf.soap44.webservices.tracker.ArtifactSoapDO attachFileToArtifact(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                                                                        java.lang.String artifactId,
                                                                                        java.lang.String comment,
                                                                                        java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                                        java.lang.String mimeType,
                                                                                        byte[] data)
                                                                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method uploads the file and gets the new file descriptor returned from the SFEE system. It then associates the file descriptor to the artifact there by adding the attachment to the artifact.

Parameters:
sessionId - - The current session id
artifactId - - The artifact's id to which the attachment should be added.
comment - - Comment for the attachment addition
fileName - - Name of the file that is attached to this artifact
mimeType - - MIME type of the file that is being attached.
data - - the file content
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - - if any SOAP api call fails
